name.ja: コスモ・プレデクター

requirement.en: You have no other monsters on your field during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.

effect.en: Add 1 Level 8 Galaxy Type monster from your Graveyard to your hand. This turn, this face-up card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a "Greystorm Reverie" in Attack Position.

ja.set_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! RUSH DUEL: Saikyo Battle Royale!! Let's Go! Go Rush!! Galactica Victories promotional card
